overview:
Liquid Sky Pty Ltd | chiefDreamer Europe

Développeur, créateur web depuis plus de douze ans. David est bilingue anglais/français.

Design and devlopment of fine business websites for more than 12 years David is bilingual English, French

After over 25 years of programming and print/logo design and over 15 years of web design and development, David returned to Europe with his family. His web development design services will continue as “expat web design” now that he has relocated in Annecy, France from May 2007.

Quick history Born in Italy in ‘67, grew up in the UK and Switzerland, landed in Australia in ‘80. Got his hands on an Apple IIe then a Macintosh in ‘84. Studied architecture, wore a skinny tie, was courted by the advertising industry, discovered typography & Macromedia Director. Gravitated towards hypertext and finally settled on web design and development - the perfect job for a born again hippie. Met Penny in ‘93. Lily (born 2003) and Jasper (born 2006) back to France in 2007…hair receding, the saga continues :)
